title: EU looking to see if Facebook's Libra currency poses competition risks
text: EU regulators are examining Facebook's  proposed Libra cryptocurrency to see if it harms competition, Europe's antitrust regulator said on Wednesday, the latest watchdog to voice concerns about the social network's move into financial services.

title: Now Facebook says it may remove Like counts
text: Facebook could soon start hiding the Like counter on News Feed posts to protect users’ from envy and dissuade them from self-censorship. Instagram is already testing this in 7 countries including Canada and Brazil, showing a post’s audience just a few names of mutual friends who’ve Liked it instead of the total number.

title: What The Wall Street Journal Isn't Saying About FAANG Stocks' Poor Performance
